name: Baldur's Maze
description:
You find yourself trapped in a strange, eerie maze, filled with doors and equipment from previous explorers scattered around. To escape, you must collect the elusive spirit orbs that are scattered throughout the maze. But be careful! A rolling monster known as "Baldur" is lurking in the maze, ready to catch you. You have no weapons to defend yourself, only a single use stun, so you must rely on your wits and stealth to avoid detection.

Explore the maze's twists and turns, navigate through long hallways, and search for secret paths to find all the orbs. Along the way, you may find monitors that will save your progress, but beware of Baldur's rolling path as it may block your escape route.

Can you outsmart Baldur and escape the maze with all the orbs? Play Baldur's Maze now and find out!

Features:

  • Unique maze design with various paths and secret rooms
  • Challenging gameplay with limited ways to defend yourself
  • Baldur the rolling monster who patrols the maze
  • Spirit orbs to collect and unlock the exit
  • Monitors to save your progress throughout the game

Are you ready to take on the challenge?
